00014 #include "xsignal.h"
00015 #include "atomic_queue.h"
00016 #include "xscheduler.h"
00017 
00018 threadid_t g_main_thread_id = threadID();
00019 
00020 bool isMainThread() {
00021     return pthread_equal(threadID(), g_main_thread_id);
00022 }
00023 
00024 XListener::XListener(FLAGS flags) :
00025     m_flags(flags) {
00026     if(flags & FLAG_AVOID_DUP) {
00027         ASSERT(flags & FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00028     }
00029     if((flags & FLAG_DELAY_SHORT) || (flags & FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE)) {
00030         ASSERT(flags & FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00031     }
00032 }
00033 XListener::~XListener() {}
00034 void
00035 XListener::mask() {
00036     for(;;) {
00037         FLAGS old = m_flags;
00038         if(m_flags.compareAndSet(old, (FLAGS)(old | FLAG_MASKED)))
00039             break;
00040     }
00041 }
00042 void
00043 XListener::unmask() {
00044     for(;;) {
00045         FLAGS old = m_flags;
00046         if(m_flags.compareAndSet(old, (FLAGS)(old & ~FLAG_MASKED)))
00047             break;
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 unsigned int
00052 XListener::delay_ms() const {
00053     unsigned int delay = std::min(20u, g_adaptiveDelay);
00054     if(m_flags & FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE)
00055         delay = g_adaptiveDelay;
00056     if(m_flags & FLAG_DELAY_SHORT)
00057         delay /= 4;
00058     return delay;
00059 }
00060 
00061 _XTalkerBase::_XTalkerBase() : m_bMasked(false) {}
00062 _XTalkerBase::~_XTalkerBase() {}
00063 void
00064 _XTalkerBase::mask() {
00065     ASSERT(!m_bMasked);
00066     m_bMasked = true;
00067 }
00068 void
00069 _XTalkerBase::unmask() {
00070     ASSERT(m_bMasked);
00071     m_bMasked = false;
00072 }
